segments.text: I saw your ad in The New York Times . I am seriously considering one of the apartments listed in it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We are happy to help you . May I know which one it is ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The two-bedroom apartment on 38th east street .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , it is conveniently located , isn't it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's why I think it may suit my needs .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I believe it will . It comes furnished . You can move in immediately after the lease is signed .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The ad says the rent would be 840 dollars per month . Is it true ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . But not including the utilities .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Will it possible for me to rent the apartment on a month-by-month basis ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I believe that can be arranged . But there should be a refundable security deposit , you know .
segments.speaker: S2
